import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' class SinglePost extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state={ post : [], user: [], avatar: "", } } async componentDidMount() { axios({ method:'GET', url: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/post/'+this.props.match.params.id, headers : { Authorization: "Bearer" + localStorage.getItem("userToken") }, data: null, }).then(res => { this.setState({ post : res.data.post, user : res.data.user, avatar : res.data.avatar, }) }).catch(errors => { console.log(errors.response); // alert(errors.response.data.errors) }) } render(){ return (
{/* Header */}

News


{this.state.post.title}



By {this.state.post.author}

{/* END Header */} {/* Main container */}
